divs: sighting detailslooking in sky saw 2 red\ orange lights cross the sky directly above traveling at a fixed distance from each other same speed seemed low in the sky went in my house to tell my family came back out again only to see 2 more in the same path and speed as the previous 2 this all happened around 11pm 5\21\13 both time the objects faded into the northern sky they were brightest when they were directly above me. wuld love to have some explanation kind of weird that i saw 2 sets of the same exact lights. does anyone know if anyone officially tracks anything like these happenings from like the goverment or anything?
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around May 21st 2013
Summary: 2 red glowing lights cross the sky
